body.name: SAMCOOK Chef Knife - 8 Inch 67 Layer Forged Damascus Japan VG-10 Stainless Steel Kitchen Knives Blue Resin Wood Handle High Strength And Good Toughness Razor Sharp Cutting Meat
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 24 mins
features: 【High-Quality Blade】: This japanese chef knife is made of 67 layers of VG-10 high-carbon stainless steel (HRC 60±2). The high-quality steel improves the hardness of the blade and is easy to maintain. It has very good durability, anti-rust, anti-corrosion, and does not change color. Very suitable for all kinds of slicing, dicing and shredding. Easily complete your daily kitchen work.

【Super Sharp 8 inch Chef's Knife】: This japanese kitchen knife has ultra-sharp edges and perfect arc (10-15° on each side), which meets all the chef's requirements for the knife. Each knife is carefully processed and forged and vacuum heat-treated and polished through multiple processes to achieve the best balance of hardness, toughness and sharpness, providing unparalleled performance.

【Blue Resin Wood Handle】: This professional chef knife uses ergonomic blue resin wood handle is very comfortable, providing excellent grip and perfect balance, excellent control, agility and comfort Sex. The proper balance weight between the handle and the thin blade ensures easy movement. Even if you use it for a long time, no matter your hand size, left or right or holding position, you will not feel tired and uncomfortable.

【Wide Range of Uses】: This japanese cooking knife can easily handle your daily kitchen work. You can cut, slice, dice and chop all kinds of meat, fish, vegetables, fruits, bread, sushi, etc. It is suitable for Home and restaurant kitchen.

【Perfect Gift】：Comes with exquisite high-end white gift box packaging! If you are looking for a unique and exquisite gift, then this Damascus knife is a good choice. The perfect gift for home chefs and cooking enthusiasts, mothers, fathers, grandparents, friends or yourself.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1.Unique Feather Pattern The process of folding and forging, it was folded 33 times to form a layered feather Damascus pattern. Each blade has a unique texture. These beautiful Damascus patterns can resist stains, corrosion and discoloration. 2.Blue Resin and maple Handle The handle is made of Resin and maple, which is heat-proof, moisture-proof, cold-proof, rust-proof and firm. The ergonomic handle will bring you excellent hand control, agility and comfort. 3.Mosaic-Pin Handle The ergonomic handle is artistically accented with an engraved mosaic pin, revealing this knife’s luxurious identity. 4.Full-Tang Construction The metal blade extends the entire length of the handle to withstand punishing daily use without sacrificing comfortable handling and balanced performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice knife with good looks.
reviews.reviewText: The knife is really nice, the blade is super sharp and cuts things from delicate fish, to tough root vegetables with ease. the handle is nicely weighted to help with cutting, as I didn't have to apply a tremendous force just to cut through tougher foods. It could cut things pretty thin as well, I did struggle to get a paper thin cut from what I tried, but I got very close to it. The design of the knife is also really pretty, love the colors of the handle, and the slight curve near the blade makes it easy to grip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Well-Made Knife!
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful knife, with a striking wood/resin handle. The grain of the burl wood is stunning, and looks great in contrast with the marbled blue resin.The balance of the knife is slightly weighted forward, which contributes to the ease of cutting with it. The handle is very comfortable in the hand with smoothly finished metal components.The blade is very sharp, and passes the "arm hair test". It also easily slices through a taut piece of paper.The length of the blade is, in my opinion, the ideal length for a chef's knife.The forged Damascus steel blade has an attractive pattern. I also like the mosaic design of the rivet.The knife comes beautifully gift boxed, and would make an ideal gift for yourself, or for anyone who enjoys cooking!
